title: Tropicana Village
posting_body: ['Tropicana Village Apartments', 'Our location in the southeast area of Las Vegas, NV, include 1, 2 and 3 bedroom floor plans with fireplace in 3 bedrooms, ceiling fans, vertical blinds, private patio or balcony, separate dining area and units are cable ready.', 'Our community offers a resident clubhouse with business center, 2 sparkling pools, modern laundry rooms, covered parking, and your family pet is welcome.', 'Walk to schools.', 'Close to shopping, dining and Vegas style entertainment.', 'We also have 2 water dispensers on property and barbeque area with a soda vending machine.', 'We are now accepting applications online at <URL>/', 'We are open Monday - Friday', '8:00 AM -5:00PM', 'Great Rates:', '1x1s 592 Sqft $1125', '1x1L 627 Sqft $1125', '2x1 760 Sqft $1350', '2x1.5 840 Sqft $1400', '3x2 1150 Sqft $1536', '3x2H 1440 Sqft $1686', 'Application $50', 'Holding fee $200 (transfers to an administration fee when you move in)', 'Security Deposit= OAC (typically can range from a minimue of $250 to 1 months rent)', 'We check rental Verification, Credit check, Criminal, & income requirement (3 times the rent)', 'Application Process: May take up to 72hrs for approval response', 'The apartments include;', '• All appliance are electrical', '• Gas is required only for heating', '• Central air &heating', '• Refrigerator', '• Electric stove', '• Dishwasher', '• Garbage Disposal', '• Balcony for 2nd floor units', '• Patio for 1st floor unit']
